span.strong:
Outdoor Tech Support Available
Thursday 4/23 11am- 1pm
Masks and social distancing will be practiced.
The front of the school has new wifi hotspot with picnic tables.

p.br:
________________________________________________________
COVID-19: Voluntown Public Schools is closed through May 20th or until further notice.

span.strong: Breakfast and Lunch "Grab and GO" meals are being offered at Griswold Middle School for any Voluntown Public Schools student under 18 from 10am-2pm. Please use this resource!

br.span:
*******************
Digital Learning Tech FAQs
Do your children need a chromebook? We have loaners.
How to connect a chromebook our wifi?
How do we navigate Google Classroom?
Is there a computer application that can read text to my child?
Is there an application that my child can use to turn his/her voice into text?
************************
Our teachers are working to ensure we are providing resources to support learning! Looking for a teacher website? Just scroll down past the links below.
